main event: A witness observed a bright light moving erratically across the sky and disappearing to the north, resembling a meteor but behaving in an unusual manner.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 8/15/52 in Quincy, Massachusetts., The object appeared as a bright light and was noted for its erratic movement., The witnesses compared the object's motion to that of a meteor., The report suggests that the witness is credible and appears valid., No further action was deemed necessary according to the report.
sighted object: a bright erratic light in the sky
witness description: witness described seeing a bright light moving strangely
